thread.title: Dickson Wrestling Championship begins with early upsets
thread.title_full: Dickson Wrestling Championship begins with early upsets

author: Nwafor Polycarp
title: Dickson Wrestling Championship begins with early upsets
text:
Home » Sports » Dickson Wrestling Championship begins with early upsets Dickson Wrestling Championship begins with early upsets On 3:26 am In Sports by Nwafor Polycarp Comments 
……As governor commissions new gym 
The Second Governor Dickson Wrestling Classic Championship began at the Samson Siasia Stadium, Yenagoa, Bayelsa Friday with performances which showed that Nigeria is inching her way into becoming a global power house in wrestling. 
The number of wrestlers who registered for the championship was unprecedented as over 300 in both female and male categories have been sweating to make the national team even as there were early upsets. Commonwealth champion, Sinivie Boltic was humiliated by an unknown wrestler from Delta State. 
The championship which involves 30 weight classes in Greco Roman and Freestyle is aimed at selecting athletes for the national team as president of the Nigeria Wrestling Federation, Dr Daniel Igali said that any athlete who fails the championship may have lost his or her place in the build-up for the Commonwealth Games next year. 
An elated Igali who spoke on the high standard on display added that Nigeria is sure of podium performances at the Commonwealth Games in Australia next year and the 2020 Olympic Games. He commended the young wrestlers for giving the old ones a run for their money.
